dmca.title: [ABUSE] Namestead copyright infringement (find-love-fast.com)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 13, 2004 11:04 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Namestead copyright infringement (find-love-fast.com)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwaring to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: ns.info@namestead.com <ns.info@namestead.com>
To: <bjampala@hotmail.com>
Date: Friday, December 10, 2004, 12:34:11 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Namestead copyright infringement (find-love-fast.com)

===8<==============Original message text===============
December 9, 2004

Bhavani Jampala
Bhavani Jampala (bjampala@hotmail.com)
+1.2063383636
1455 Tallevast Rd.
STE L4447
Sarasota, FL 34243-5036
US

Dear Bhavani Jampala,

We are the providers of Namestead.com, and the owners of all content posted
at http://www.namestead.com/.

It has come to our attention that your web-site, www.find-love-fast.com,
uses our content without our permission.

Your unauthorized use of our copyrighted material on your web-site gives an
impression that your web-site may somehow be associated with Namestead. Your
wrongful misuse of our content is capable, without question, of causing
confusion, mistake and deception to the purchasing public, as well as
dilution of our content, and will irreparably damage our company.

It is our opinion that your use of content from the Namestead website
represents a clear encroachment upon our rights under title 17, U.S. Code,
the common law, and unfair competition as it may lead the public to believe
that our company has endorsed, sponsored, or has in some way associated its
resources with your endeavor.

For the foregoing reasons, we hereby demand that within 48 hours you:

- - immediately cease and desist from using our content or any variant
versions thereof on your web-site, business cards, letterhead, brochures
and/or advertisements or in any other medium;
- - immediately destroy all materials in your possession which incorporate
our
content or any variant versions thereof;
- - immediately destroy all materials used to produce the above-referenced
items; and
- - provide full details on the carrying out of steps (1) through (3).

If we do not receive immediate assurance of your compliance with the above
demands, we will have no choice but to take appropriate actions to protect
our rights.

Very truly yours,

Namestead

- ---

References:

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&q=find-love-fast.com+namestead&btnG=S
earch



===8<===========End of original message text===========

Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBvcuRvK/XpJs6oyURAjftAKCbIvIsmo4lyzVeMlrMHvkKUmWdwACeJjHP
AMBagzvKwgMpHfnWyXqldko=
=RRLM
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
